option.value:
The time and date of this login have been sent to the system logs.
%1b[00mVMware offers supported, powerful system administration tools. Please see www.vmware.com/go/sysadmintools for details.
The ESXi Shell can be disabled by an administrative user. See the vSphere Security documentation for more information.

optionDef.label: Welcome message for the Direct Console User Interface (DCUI)
optionDef.summary: A welcome message in the initial screen of the Direct Console User Interface (DCUI). Use an empty string to reset to the default message.

optionDef.label: Soft maximum dirty buffers
optionDef.summary: Flush immediately if this many buffers are dirty (percent)

optionDef.label: Maximum dirty buffers
optionDef.summary: Block writers if this many buffers are dirty (percent)

optionDef.label: PerFileHardMaxDirty
optionDef.summary: Block writers if this many buffers of a given file are dirtied (percent)

optionDef.label: Flush interval
optionDef.summary: Flush at this interval (milliseconds)

optionDef.label: DCacheSize
optionDef.summary: Size of CBRC Data Cache in MB. This cannot be changed if CBRC.Enable is set to 1.

optionDef.label: DCacheMemReserved
optionDef.summary: Memory consumed by CBRC Data Cache (in MB)

optionDef.label: DigestJournalBootInterval
optionDef.summary: Interval (in minutes) for which Digest Journal is temporarily disabled to avoid interfering with the boot process

optionDef.label: Enable
optionDef.summary: Enable Content Based Read Cache

optionDef.label: COWMaxHeapSizeMB
optionDef.summary: Maximum size (in MB) to which the COW heap is allowed to grow

optionDef.label: log.level
optionDef.summary: Controls the global log level.

optionDef.label: plugins.hostsvc.esxAdminsGroup
optionDef.summary: Active Directory group name that is automatically granted administrator privileges on the ESX.

optionDef.label: plugins.hostsvc.esxAdminsGroupAutoAdd
optionDef.summary: Controls whether the group specified by 'esxAdminsGroup' is automatically granted administrator permission.

optionDef.label: plugins.hostsvc.esxAdminsGroupUpdateInterval
optionDef.summary: Interval between checks for whether the group specified by 'esxAdminsGroup' has appeared in Active Directory, in minutes.

optionDef.label: Debug Managed Object Browser enabled
optionDef.summary: Read-only flag indicating whether the Debug Managed Object Browser is enabled on the ESX Server.

optionDef.label: plugins.vimsvc.authValidateInterval
optionDef.summary: Number of minutes between each validation of all known users and groups - set to zero to disable validation.

optionDef.label: plugins.vimsvc.userSearch.maxResults
optionDef.summary: Maximum number of users and groups to display in the Add Permissions dialog - set to zero to disable the limit.

optionDef.label: plugins.vimsvc.userSearch.maxTimeSeconds
optionDef.summary: Number of seconds to wait for a search for users and groups to return results - set to zero to disable the timeout.

optionDef.label: HostRebalancePeriod
optionDef.summary: average milliseconds between opportunities for a pcpu to migrate vcpus from within the whole system, 0 to disable

optionDef.label: PackageRebalancePeriod
optionDef.summary: average milliseconds between opportunities for a pcpu to migrate vcpus from within a package, 0 to disable

optionDef.label: L3RebalancePeriod
optionDef.summary: average milliseconds between opportunities for a pcpu to migrate vcpus from within the shared L3 cache, 0 to disable

optionDef.label: L2RebalancePeriod
optionDef.summary: average milliseconds between opportunities for a pcpu to migrate vcpus from within the shared L2 cache, 0 to disable

optionDef.label: HTRebalancePeriod
optionDef.summary: average milliseconds between opportunities for a pcpu to migrate vcpus from within a core

optionDef.label: FairnessRebalancePcpus
optionDef.summary: max number of PCPUs to be considered when doing fairness rebalance, 0 to disable

optionDef.label: WakeupMigrateIdlePcpus
optionDef.summary: max number of PCPUs to be considered when doing wakeup idle rebalance, 0 to disable

optionDef.label: PcpuMigrateIdlePcpus
optionDef.summary: max number of PCPUs to be considered when doing pcpu idle rebalance, 0 to disable

optionDef.label: MoveCurrentRunnerPcpus
optionDef.summary: max number of PCPUs to be considered when searching for runner move opportunity, 0 to disable

optionDef.label: Credit age period
optionDef.summary: Period in milliseconds

optionDef.label: NonTimerWakeupRate
optionDef.summary: Disable P state if the running vcpu's non-timer wakeup rate is higher than this threshold, 0 to disable

optionDef.label: CommRateThreshold
optionDef.summary: threshold for inter-sched-context rate above which the contexts are considered to be related (in num/sec)

optionDef.label: DefaultImpact
optionDef.summary: the default expected efficiency loss when the related contexts are not running on the same LLC (in percentage)

optionDef.label: ActionLoadThreshold
optionDef.summary: load threshold below which vcpu affinity migration is performed, 0 to disable

optionDef.label: Bound lag quanta
optionDef.summary: Number of global quanta before bound lag

optionDef.label: HTWholeCoreThreshold
optionDef.summary: a vcpu with vtime falling behind by this threshold (in ms) is eligible to use the whole core (HT only), 0 to disable (may violate resource settings)

optionDef.label: HTStolenAgeThreshold
optionDef.summary: the amount of htStolen time a vcpu can keep without being aged (in seconds)

optionDef.label: Quantum
optionDef.summary: Quantum in milliseconds

optionDef.label: UseMwait
optionDef.summary: use MWAIT vs. HLT in the idle loop; 0: use HLT, 1: use MWAIT if possible, 2: choose by cpu type

optionDef.label: CoschedCrossCall
optionDef.summary: 0: disable cosched on crosscall; 1: enable cosched on crosscall

optionDef.label: CoschedPreempt
optionDef.summary: 0: handoff on cosched request; 1: preempt on cosched request

optionDef.label: CoschedHandoffLLC
optionDef.summary: 0: handoff by switching pcpu; 1: handoff to LLC if possible

optionDef.label: CoschedPollUsec
optionDef.summary: interval between coscheduling skew checks, in usec

optionDef.label: CoschedCostartThreshold
optionDef.summary: costart threshold in usec, costart threshold should be less than costopThreshold

optionDef.label: CoschedCostopThreshold
optionDef.summary: maximum skew between vcpus in usec, 0 to disable

optionDef.label: CoschedHandoffSkip
optionDef.summary: only skip handoff if ready time is smaller than this threshold, in usec, 0 to allow skip always

optionDef.label: Intra-core migrate
optionDef.summary: When to allow intra-core migrations [0:when inter-core migration allowed, 1:always]

optionDef.label: Enable admission check per virtual CPU
optionDef.summary: Perform additional admission control check that per virtual CPU virtual machine minimum does not exceed the speed of a single physical CPU

optionDef.label: SchedPerfOptimizations
optionDef.summary: Bitmask of performance counter based scheduler optimizations. Bit 0: Enable performance counter statistics; 1: Cache occupancy estimation

optionDef.label: MaxSampleRateLg
optionDef.summary: Sampling system services at most (2^MaxSampleRateLg) times a second

optionDef.label: AllowWideVsmp
optionDef.summary: Allow VMs with more VCPUs than host PCPUs, 0 to disable

optionDef.label: DisableMicrocodeUpdate
optionDef.summary: Disable microcode update.

optionDef.label: LimitEnforcementThreshold
optionDef.summary: Only allows low-vtime children ro run when a group/VM's vtimeLimit is smaller than the global virtual time by less than this threshold (in ms), 0 to disable

optionDef.label: DCUI Access
optionDef.summary: One or more comma-separated local users which are granted unconditional access to DCUI, even if they don't have administrator role on the host.

optionDef.label: HardwareAcceleratedMove
optionDef.summary: Enable hardware accelerated VMFS data movement (requires compliant hardware)

optionDef.label: HardwareAcceleratedInit
optionDef.summary: Enable hardware accelerated VMFS data initialization (requires compliant hardware)

optionDef.label: AlgoType
optionDef.summary: Digest Crypto Hash Type (1=SHA-1, 2=SHA-256).

optionDef.label: BlockSize
optionDef.summary: Blocksize in the original VMDK to compute crypto hash codes. In pages of 4K size. Value needs to be power of 2.

optionDef.label: CollisionEnabled
optionDef.summary: Enable collision detection (0=disabled, 1=enabled)

optionDef.label: JournalCoverage
optionDef.summary: Journal coverage in MB. Value needs to be power of 2.

optionDef.label: UpdateOnClose
optionDef.summary: Enable crypto-hash updates on DiskLib_Close (0=disabled, 1=enabled).

optionDef.label: MaxDentryPerObj
optionDef.summary: Maximum directory entries cached per directory

optionDef.label: Shares normal
optionDef.summary: Shares for normal disk priority

optionDef.label: Shares high
optionDef.summary: Shares for high disk priority

optionDef.label: Shares low
optionDef.summary: Shares for low disk priority

optionDef.label: BandwidthCap
optionDef.summary: cap on disk bandwidth (KB/s) usage

optionDef.label: ThroughputCap
optionDef.summary: cap on disk throughput (IO/s) usage

optionDef.label: Sector maximum difference
optionDef.summary: Distance in sectors at which the disk BW schedules affinity stops

optionDef.label: Scheduled quantum
optionDef.summary: Number of consecutive requests from one world

optionDef.label: IdleCredit
optionDef.summary: Amount of idle credit that a virtual machine can gain for I/O requests

optionDef.label: SchedulerWithReservation
optionDef.summary: Disk I/O scheudler (0:default 1:mclock)

optionDef.label: SchedQPriorityPercentage
optionDef.summary: Percentage of priority commands to serve from priority queue

optionDef.label: Scheduled QControl sequence requests
optionDef.summary: Number of consecutive requests from a virtual machine required to raise the outstanding commands to maximum

optionDef.label: Scheduled QControl VM switches
optionDef.summary: Number of switches between commands issued by different virtual machines required to reduce outstanding commands to CONFIG_DISK_CIF

optionDef.label: Maximum LUN
optionDef.summary: Maximum number of LUNs per target scanned for

optionDef.label: Support sparse LUN
optionDef.summary: Support for sparse LUNs if set to one

optionDef.label: Use report LUN
optionDef.summary: Use the REPORT LUN command to increase scanning speed for devices

optionDef.label: Use device reset
optionDef.summary: Use device reset (instead of bus reset) to reset a SCSI device

optionDef.label: Use LUN reset
optionDef.summary: Use LUN reset (instead of device.bus reset) to reset a SCSI device

optionDef.label: Retry unit attention
optionDef.summary: Retry all SCSI commands that return a unit attention error

optionDef.label: Path evaluation time
optionDef.summary: The number of seconds between FC path evaluations

optionDef.label: DeviceReclaimTime
optionDef.summary: The number of seconds between device re-claim attempts

optionDef.label: EnableNaviReg
optionDef.summary: Enable automatic NaviAgent registration with EMC CLARiiON and Invista

optionDef.label: Delay on busy
optionDef.summary: Delay in milliseconds for completion of commands with a BUSY status

optionDef.label: Reset latency
optionDef.summary: Delay in milliseconds between reset thread wakeups

optionDef.label: Maximum reset latency
optionDef.summary: Delay in milliseconds before logging warnings and spawning new reset worlds if a reset is overdue or taking too long

optionDef.label: Reset period
optionDef.summary: Delay in seconds between bus resets retries

optionDef.label: Reset maximum retries
optionDef.summary: Maximum number of bus reset retries. Set to 0 for no limit.

optionDef.label: Reset thread minimum
optionDef.summary: Minimum number of reset handler threads

optionDef.label: Reset thread maximum
optionDef.summary: Maximum number of reset handler threads

optionDef.label: Reset thread expires
optionDef.summary: Life in seconds of an inactive reset handle thread

optionDef.label: Reset overdue log period
optionDef.summary: Delay in seconds between logs of overdue reset

optionDef.label: PreventVMFSOverwrite
optionDef.summary: Prevent overwriting VMFS partitions

optionDef.label: DumpMaxRetries
optionDef.summary: Max number of I/O retries during disk dump

optionDef.label: DumpPollMaxRetries
optionDef.summary: Max number of device poll retries during disk dump

optionDef.label: DumpPollDelay
optionDef.summary: Number of microseconds to wait between polls during a disk dump.

optionDef.label: DiskMaxIOSize
optionDef.summary: Max Disk READ/WRITE I/O size before splitting (in KB)

optionDef.label: QFullSampleSize
optionDef.summary: I/O samples to monitor for detecting non-transient queue full condition. Should be nonzero to enable queue depth throttling.

optionDef.label: QFullThreshold
optionDef.summary: BUSY or QFULL threshold, upon which LUN queue depth will be throttled. Should be <= QFullSampleSize if throttling is enabled.

optionDef.label: DiskRetryPeriod
optionDef.summary: Retry period in milliseconds for a command with retry status

optionDef.label: DiskReservationThreshold
optionDef.summary: Time window within which refcounted reservations on a device are permitted (in msec)

optionDef.label: DiskDelayPDLHelper
optionDef.summary: Delay PDL helper in secs

optionDef.label: ReqCallThreshold
optionDef.summary: Threshold in number of pending requests before calling into vmkernel to process the requests

optionDef.label: ReturnCCForNoSpace
optionDef.summary: Return CC 0x7/0x27/0x7 in the event where a backing datastore has run out of space as opposed to posting a monitor event to halt the VM

optionDef.label: AutoremoveOnPDL
optionDef.summary: Autoremove paths to a disk that is in PDL (Permanent Device Loss)

optionDef.label: SchedCostUnit
optionDef.summary: IO Scheduler Block Size for Accounting

optionDef.label: FSSLightWeightProbe
optionDef.summary: Enable light-weight efficient probe of ESX supported datastores

optionDef.label: NoWaitOnSocket
optionDef.summary: Don't wait on socket

optionDef.label: FlushSleep
optionDef.summary: Sleep time in milliseconds when nothing to flush

optionDef.label: LogBufferStallSleep
optionDef.summary: Sleep time in milliseconds when log buffer is full on the primary

optionDef.label: AckIntervalMin
optionDef.summary: Minimum time in microseconds between acks

optionDef.label: AckIntervalMax
optionDef.summary: Maximum time in microseconds between acks

optionDef.label: HeartbeatCount
optionDef.summary: Number of failed heartbeats before declare dead.

optionDef.label: HostTimeout
optionDef.summary: Time in milliseconds before declare FT host dead

optionDef.label: UseHostMonitor
optionDef.summary: Use the host monitor to ping the other host

optionDef.label: BackupExtraTimeout
optionDef.summary: Extra milliseconds before backup declares primary dead

optionDef.label: LogTimeout
optionDef.summary: Time in milliseconds to wait on log socket

optionDef.label: ExtraLogTimeout
optionDef.summary: Time in milliseconds for temporary increase in timeout

optionDef.label: PrimaryConnectTimeout
optionDef.summary: Time in milliseconds to wait when connecting to the primary

optionDef.label: BackupConnectTimeout

Two VMs sharing the same salt will be able to share memory through PShare. This option controls how this VMX option will be used: 0: no salting or isolation between VMs, 1: the value of sched.mem.pshare.salt is honored, 2: each VM will get its own salt unless the sched.mem.pshare.salt is option is non-empty.

optionDef.label: SdpsTargetRate

optionDef.label: SdpsDynamicDelaySec
optionDef.summary: Delay, in seconds, between polling when considering enabling SDPS in the first preCopy iteration.

optionDef.label: DiskOpsEnabled
optionDef.summary: Enables VMotion disk-backed operation

optionDef.label: DiskOpsStreamChunks

optionDef.label: DiskOpsChunkSize

optionDef.label: DiskOpsMaxRetries

optionDef.label: PageInPivotFwd

optionDef.label: PageInPivotBack
optionDef.summary: Steps backwards from pivot n pages before switching to forwards movement

optionDef.label: PageInPivotEnabled
optionDef.summary: Enabled pagein remote fault pivot-based page transmission ordering

optionDef.label: PageInReverse
optionDef.summary: Select pages in reverse order during pagein

optionDef.label: DetectZeroPages
optionDef.summary: Whether vMotion should detect zero pages during page transmission

optionDef.label: RemotePageFaultPages

optionDef.label: TcpTsoDeferTx

optionDef.label: LowBandwidthSysAlertThreshold

optionDef.label: Net time-out

optionDef.label: NetExpectedLineRateMBps
optionDef.summary: Expected network throughput, in MBps, for bandwidth-delay calculation

optionDef.label: NetLatencyModeThreshold

optionDef.label: TS Master

optionDef.label: DisableResumeDuringPageIn

optionDef.label: SndBufSize

optionDef.label: RcvBufSize

optionDef.label: BindToVmknic

optionDef.label: AutoBindVmknic
optionDef.summary: Autobind vMotion socket to the vmknic where data comes from. Used only for the vMotion server side, which is the vMotion listening and receiving side

optionDef.label: MonActionWaitSysAlertThresholdMS
optionDef.summary: Threshold in milliseconds for the monitor to process a pre-copy action after which a SysAlert is triggered

optionDef.label: LowMemWaitSysAlertThresholdMS
optionDef.summary: Threshold in milliseconds for the dest host to leave the low-memory state above which a SysAlert is triggered

optionDef.label: GetPageSysAlertThresholdMS
optionDef.summary: Threshold in milliseconds for the source host to prepare a page for transmission above which a SysAlert is triggered

optionDef.label: DebugChecksumMismatch
optionDef.summary: Debug checksum mismatch.

optionDef.label: PanicOnChecksumMismatch
optionDef.summary: 1 for world panic, 2 for vmkernel panic

optionDef.label: RdpiTransitionTimeMs
optionDef.summary: Milliseconds to wait for page-in completion before resuming, if rdpi is enabled

optionDef.label: MigrateCpuMinPctDefault
optionDef.summary: Desired default shared CPU reservation (in %) for VMotions

optionDef.label: MigrateCpuPctPerGb
optionDef.summary: Desired per Gbit shared CPU reservation (in %) for VMotions

optionDef.label: MigrateCpuSharesRegular
optionDef.summary: CPU shares for a regular VMotion

optionDef.label: MigrateCpuSharesHighPriority
optionDef.summary: CPU shares for a high priority VMotion

optionDef.label: Vmknic

optionDef.label: Log to file
optionDef.summary: Send VMkernel log messages to /var/log/vmkernel

optionDef.label: Log to serial
optionDef.summary: Send VMkernel log messages to the serial port

optionDef.label: DebugLogToSerial
optionDef.summary: Send vmkernel LOG messages to the serial port

optionDef.label: LogTimestampUptime
optionDef.summary: Use uptime rather than UTC for vmkernel log

optionDef.label: Log world prefix
optionDef.summary: Include running world on every log statement

optionDef.label: Minimal panic
optionDef.summary: Do not attempt core dump after purple screen

optionDef.label: Blue screen time-out
optionDef.summary: Time-out in seconds. Set to 0 for no time-out.

optionDef.label: Heartbeat time-out

optionDef.label: Heartbeat interval
optionDef.summary: Interval to check CPU lockups

optionDef.label: Panic time-out

optionDef.label: HeapPanicDestroyNonEmpty

optionDef.label: HeapMgrGuardPages

optionDef.label: MCEMonitorInterval

optionDef.label: Enable high DMA
optionDef.summary: Enable DMA above 4GB

optionDef.label: Maximum hard timer period
optionDef.summary: Maximum hard timer interrupt period in microseconds

optionDef.label: TimerTolerance
optionDef.summary: Default timer lateness tolerance in microseconds

optionDef.label: Serial baud rate
optionDef.summary: Baud rate

optionDef.label: Watchdog backtrace
optionDef.summary: Backtrace on every Nth watchdog

optionDef.label: BH time-out

optionDef.label: BhTimeBound
optionDef.summary: Time bound on BH checking in us (microseconds).

optionDef.label: Interrupt time-out
optionDef.summary: Time-out for interrupt handlers in milliseconds

optionDef.label: HordeEnabled
optionDef.summary: Enables horde mode

optionDef.label: ScreenSaverDelay

optionDef.label: WorldletActivationUS

optionDef.label: WorldletActivationsLimit
optionDef.summary: Number of worldlet activations permissible in each interruption (0==unlimited).

optionDef.summary: Worldlet load/score level below which a placement is deemed desirable

optionDef.label: WorldletLocalityBonus

optionDef.label: WorldletLoosePenalty
optionDef.summary: load penalty for leaving LOOSE affinity topology level

optionDef.label: WorldletIRQPenalty

optionDef.label: WorldletGreedySampleRun
optionDef.summary: number of runs between greedy samples, controls greedy sampling rate

optionDef.label: WorldletGreedySampleMCycles
optionDef.summary: million cycles between greedy samples, controls greedy sampling rate

optionDef.label: WorldletRemoteActivateOverhead
optionDef.summary: remote activate overhead, in cycles

optionDef.label: WorldletWorldOverheadLLC

optionDef.label: WorldletWorldOverheadRemote

optionDef.label: WorldletPreemptOverhead
optionDef.summary: overhead if worldlet preempts a running no-idle world, in percentage

optionDef.label: WorldletMigOverheadLLC
optionDef.summary: intra-cache worldlet migration overhead, default = 4/1024=0.39%

optionDef.label: WorldletMigOverheadRemote
optionDef.summary: inter-cache worldlet migration overhead, default = 16/1024=1.56%

optionDef.label: GuestLibAllowHostInfo
optionDef.summary: Allow guest to read host-level metrics

optionDef.label: UserSocketUnixMaxBufferSize
optionDef.summary: Max buffer size for UW unix domain sockets (bytes)

optionDef.label: UserDuctDynBufferSize
optionDef.summary: Max buffer size for UW duct (bytes)

optionDef.label: NMILint1IntAction
optionDef.summary: Change how a hardware generated NMI should be handled(1=enter debugger, 2=panic)

optionDef.label: SIOControlLoglevel

optionDef.label: SIOControlFlag1
optionDef.summary: Storage I/O Control Internal Flag

optionDef.label: SIOControlFlag2
optionDef.summary: Storage I/O Control Internal Flag

optionDef.label: APD Timeout
optionDef.summary: Number of seconds a device can be in APD before failing User World I/O.

optionDef.label: APD Handling Enable
optionDef.summary: Enable Storage APD Handling.

optionDef.label: KeepKernelDebugRegs
optionDef.summary: Track kernel-specific debug registers instead of per-world ones

optionDef.label: IommuMapReserved
optionDef.summary: Map ranges marked as reserved by BIOS in IOMMU domains

optionDef.label: DebugClient
optionDef.summary: Debug client to choose(SerialPort, Network)

optionDef.label: LogPort
optionDef.summary: Name of serial port to use for logging (COM1, COM2, vmwire, fw)

optionDef.label: GDBPort
optionDef.summary: Name of serial port to use for GDB debugging (COM1, COM2, vmwire, fw)

optionDef.label: ShellPort
optionDef.summary: Name of serial port to use for visor shell (COM1, COM2, vmwire, fw)

optionDef.label: ConsolePort
optionDef.summary: Name of serial port to use for visor console (COM1, COM2, vmwire, fw)

optionDef.label: Proc verbose
optionDef.summary: Option unused

optionDef.label: PreferredHostName
optionDef.summary: Preferred Host name

optionDef.label: WorldletLoadType
optionDef.summary: Worldlet load type

optionDef.label: SIOControlOptions
optionDef.summary: Storage I/O Control Options

optionDef.label: DefaultHardwareVersion
optionDef.summary: Default virtual machine compatibility

optionDef.summary: Timeout for DatastoreNamespaceManager operations in milliseconds

optionDef.label: Misc.HostAgentUpdateLevel
optionDef.summary: The update level of Host Agent.

optionDef.summary: Timeout for VM MetadataManager operations in milliseconds

optionDef.summary: Time (in seconds) between updates to a disk lock file

optionDef.label: LockUpdateTimeout
optionDef.summary: Time (in seconds) before we abort an outstanding lock update

optionDef.label: Maximum number of lock renew failures
optionDef.summary: Number of update failures before a disk file lock is declared stale

optionDef.label: Heartbeat frequency
optionDef.summary: Time in seconds between heartbeats

optionDef.label: Heartbeat time-out
optionDef.summary: Time in seconds before an outstanding heartbeat is stopped

optionDef.label: Heartbeat delta
optionDef.summary: Time in seconds since the last successful update before a heartbeat is sent

optionDef.label: Maximum heartbeat failures
optionDef.summary: Number of sequential failures before a volume is marked down

optionDef.label: Maximum NFS volumes count
optionDef.summary: Maximum number of mounted NFS volumes

optionDef.label: Socket send buffer size
optionDef.summary: Default size of socket send buffer (KB)

optionDef.label: Socket receive buffer size
optionDef.summary: Default size of socket receive buffer (KB)

optionDef.label: Remount volume frequency
optionDef.summary: Time in seconds before attempting to remount a volume

optionDef.label: SyncRetries
optionDef.summary: Number of retries before synchronous IO fails (10 seconds per retry)

optionDef.label: LogNfsStat3
optionDef.summary: Log nfsstat3 code

optionDef.label: MaxQueueDepth
optionDef.summary: Maximum per-Volume queue depth

optionDef.label: MaxGlobalRxQueueCount
optionDef.summary: Global max length of rx queues for all virtual ports on a ESX host that support queueing

optionDef.summary: Maximum length of the rx queue for virtual ports whose clients support queuing

optionDef.label: Max net Rx queue length
optionDef.summary: Maximum length of the Rx queue for the physical NICs

optionDef.label: Maximum net Tx queue length
optionDef.summary: Maximum length of the Tx queue for the physical NICs

optionDef.label: LinkFlappingThreshold
optionDef.summary: Max number of link down events per minute before considering a link unstable (0 to deactivate)

optionDef.label: TeamPolicyUpDelay
optionDef.summary: Delay (ms) before considering an `uplink up' event relevant

optionDef.label: UplinkKillAsyncTimeout
optionDef.summary: Timeout (ms) waiting for async when world is killed.

optionDef.label: UplinkAbortDisconnectTimeout
optionDef.summary: Timeout (ms) waiting for pending calls to finish when disconnecting.

optionDef.label: UplinkTxQueuesDispEnabled
optionDef.summary: Enables dispatching of port traffic on multiple tx queues

optionDef.label: Guest Tx copy break
optionDef.summary: Transmits smaller than this will be copied rather than mapped

optionDef.label: VmxnetTxCopySize
optionDef.summary: vmxnet tx <= than this will be fully copied with no need for completion.

optionDef.label: VmxnetCopyTxRunLimit
optionDef.summary: non-Win vmxnet2/3 tx will have at most so many fully copied tx's in a row (65536 and larger means never).

optionDef.label: VmxnetWinCopyTxRunLimit
optionDef.summary: Win vmxnet2/3 tx will have at most so many fully copied tx's in a row (65536 and larger means never).

optionDef.label: VmxnetWinUDPTxFullCopy
optionDef.summary: whether Windows vmxnet UDP tx is fullCopy.

optionDef.label: VmxnetDoTsoSplit
optionDef.summary: whether to split TSO pkts before LPD; 1: halved; 3: VmxnetTsoSplitSize; 2: hybrid.

optionDef.label: VmxnetTsoSplitSize
optionDef.summary: split (byte) size; only used if DoTsoSplit >= 2.

optionDef.label: VmxnetTsoSplitBnd
optionDef.summary: when VmxnetDoTsoSplit is 1 or 2, use targetSize as the tsoSplit threshold if the overall pkt list already has this number of pkts.

optionDef.label: VmxnetBiDirNoTsoSplit
optionDef.summary: For bidirectional traffic, don't do tsoSplit.

optionDef.label: VmxnetBiDirNeedsTsoTx
optionDef.summary: Need to see Tso Tx to qualify for tsoSplit bidirectional traffic condition.

optionDef.label: Vmxnet3WinIntrHints
optionDef.summary: whether intr hints are used for Windows vmxnet3.

optionDef.label: VmxnetDoLroSplit
optionDef.summary: whether for vmxnet LRO avoids aggregating all pkts into a single (> 2 mss) large pkt.

optionDef.label: VmxnetLroSplitBnd
optionDef.summary: when VmxnetDoLroSplit is non-zero, while pktList is larger than this number, lroSplit is not done.

optionDef.label: VmknicDoLroSplit
optionDef.summary: whether for vmknic LRO avoids aggregating all pkts into a single (> 2 ms) large pkt.

optionDef.label: VmknicLroSplitBnd
optionDef.summary: when VmknicDoLroSplit is non-zero, while pktList is larger than this number, lroSplit is not done.

optionDef.label: Use proc
optionDef.summary: Populate /proc/vmware/net

optionDef.label: Populate legacy entries
optionDef.summary: Enable or disable populating legacy entries in /proc/vmware/net

optionDef.label: Notify switch
optionDef.summary: Broadcasts an arp request on net handle enable

optionDef.label: Net Tx do not cluster size
optionDef.summary: Transmits smaller than this will not be subject to clustering.coalescing

optionDef.label: Packet allocation retry count
optionDef.summary: Number of attempts for allocating packet within the page

optionDef.label: CoalesceVersion
optionDef.summary: Set the coalesce version.

optionDef.label: Coalesce Tx time-out
optionDef.summary: Set the coalesce time-out in microseconds

optionDef.label: CoalesceFineTxTimeout
optionDef.summary: set the fine coalesce timeout in microseconds

optionDef.label: CoalesceTimeoutType
optionDef.summary: set the coalesce timeout type: fine(1 ms by default) or coarse (4 ms by default)

optionDef.label: CoalesceFineTimeoutCPU
optionDef.summary: Set which CPU the fine timer will run on

optionDef.label: Coalesce default on
optionDef.summary: Dynamic coalescing on by default

optionDef.label: CoalesceLowTxRate
optionDef.summary: No tx coalescing calibration when the number of pkts tx per timeout is lower than this number.

optionDef.label: CoalesceLowRxRate
optionDef.summary: No Rx coalescing calibration when the number of pkts Rx per timeout is lower than this number.

optionDef.label: CoalesceTxAlwaysPoll
optionDef.summary: Whether always poll Tx at coalesce timeout handler.

optionDef.label: CoalesceMatchedQs
optionDef.summary: Whether to use matched TxRxQ-pairs mode when applicable.

optionDef.label: CoalesceMultiRxQCalib
optionDef.summary: When not in matched TxRxQ-pairs mode, whether to uses separate RxQ Calib.

optionDef.label: CoalesceTxQDepthCap
optionDef.summary: Cap of Tx coalescing size.

optionDef.label: CoalesceRxQDepthCap
optionDef.summary: Cap of Rx coalescing size.

optionDef.label: vNicTxPollBound
optionDef.summary: max # normalPkts per poll.

optionDef.label: vNicNumDeferredReset
optionDef.summary: max # normalPkts per poll.

optionDef.label: BHNetCoalesceTimeout
optionDef.summary: Whether to call coalesce timeout in BH NetPoll.

optionDef.label: vmxnetThroughputWeight
optionDef.summary: How far to favor throughput in vmxnet behavior.

optionDef.label: CoalesceNoVmmVmkTx
optionDef.summary: Whether to try disable all vmm->vmk tx transitions.

optionDef.label: CoalesceFavorNoVmmVmkTx
optionDef.summary: Favor disabling all vmm->vmk tx transitions; boost its score by factor of this/64.

optionDef.label: CoalesceMrqLt
optionDef.summary: Whether to set a RxQ's coalesce to zero based on per-RxQ Low Traffic.

optionDef.label: CoalesceMrqTriggerReCalib
optionDef.summary: Whether to let individual RxQ's perf change trigger re-calib.

optionDef.label: CoalesceMrqMetricRxOnly
optionDef.summary: Whether to force individual RxQ's perf metric to be rx pkt cnt only.

optionDef.label: CoalesceMrqMetricAllowTxOnly
optionDef.summary: Whether to allow's individual RxQ's perf metric to be tx pkt cnt only; if not, it will be tx + rx, or rx only.

optionDef.label: CoalesceMrqRatioMetric
optionDef.summary: Whether Tx perf score is attributed to RxQ according to rxPktCnt ratio.

optionDef.label: CoalesceRxLtStopCalib
optionDef.summary: Whether Rx Low Traffic stops Rx calibration.

optionDef.label: CoalesceMrqOverallStop
optionDef.summary: Whether to use overall performance to stop RxQ Calib.

optionDef.label: CoalesceFlexMrq
optionDef.summary: Whether to dynamically switch on/off multiRxQCalib.

optionDef.label: CoalesceRBCRate
optionDef.summary: Target event rate for RateBasedCoalescing

optionDef.label: NetLatencyAwareness
optionDef.summary: Whether to check virtual machine's latency settings or not for vmxnet2/3

optionDef.label: Ethernet switch hash size
optionDef.summary: Number of ports on the switch x 2^N is the size of the hash table for looking up MACs

optionDef.label: EtherswitchHeapMax
optionDef.summary: The maximum size (in Megabytes) to which the etherswitch heap can grow. (REQUIRES REBOOT!)

optionDef.label: No local checksum
optionDef.summary: Do not checksum local tx.rx frames

optionDef.label: NetPortFlushIterLimit
optionDef.summary: when input is serialized, this bounds the number of times a thread flushes the deferred list.

optionDef.label: NetPortFlushPktLimit
optionDef.summary: when input is serialized, this bounds the number of pkts a thread flushes from the deferred list.

optionDef.label: NetPortTrackTxRace
optionDef.summary: if enabled(1), collect statistics on potential tx race between concurrent threads.

optionDef.label: Port disable time-out
optionDef.summary: Maximum time to wait for ports to complete I/O before disabling

optionDef.label: TCP/IP heap size
optionDef.summary: Size of the TCP/IP module heap in megabytes (requires reboot)

optionDef.label: TcpipHeapMax
optionDef.summary: Max megabytes the tcpip module heap can grow to. (REQUIRES REBOOT!)

optionDef.label: TcpipRxDispatchQuota
optionDef.summary: Max # of pkts dispatched into the tcpip stack by an execution context

optionDef.label: TcpipRxDispatchQueues
optionDef.summary: Max # of dispatch queues used for RX. For low memory systems, this should be minimum value(REQUIRES REBOOT!)

optionDef.label: TcpipRxDispatchQueueMaxLen
optionDef.summary: Max # of pkts queued into a tcpip vmknic by an execution context (applied when vmknic is created)

optionDef.label: TcpipLODispatchQueueMaxLen
optionDef.summary: Max # of pkts queued into the per-protocol queue used for dispatching loopback traffic (REQUIRES REBOOT!)

optionDef.label: TcpipTxDispatchQuota
optionDef.summary: Max # of pkts dispatched from the tcpip stack by an execution context

optionDef.label: TcpipRxVmknicWorldletAffinityType
optionDef.summary: Use exact affinity for tcpip input worldlet (Takes hold at port creation time)

optionDef.label: TcpipLogPackets
optionDef.summary: Turns on packet logging for a vmknic on debug builds, in a circular & in-memory buffer (Takes effect during vmknic creation time)

optionDef.label: TcpipLogPacketsCount
optionDef.summary: Number of packets to log in the in-memory logger. 24570 packets take up about 1.2 MB, and Tx & Rx use separate buffers. (Takes effect during vmknic creation time)

optionDef.label: TcpipDgramRateLimiting
optionDef.summary: Enable Tx rate limiting for UDP sockets

optionDef.label: TcpipPendPktSocketFreeTimeout
optionDef.summary: Time Delay in seconds, for freeing UDP sockets that have pending packets for Tx completion

optionDef.label: Maximum page in queue length
optionDef.summary: Maximum number of paging requests to queue for guest DMA

optionDef.label: Maximum simultaneous beacons
optionDef.summary: Maximum number of beacons to send in one beacon cycle

optionDef.label: MaxBeaconVlans
optionDef.summary: maximum number of VLANs to probe with beacons.

optionDef.label: AdvertisementDuration
optionDef.summary: duration of RARP advertisements

optionDef.label: TcpipNoBcopyRx
optionDef.summary: Avoid bcopy in tcp rx

optionDef.label: TcpipCopySmallTx
optionDef.summary: Copy and tx complete small packets for tcp tx

optionDef.label: TcpipLRONoDelayAck
optionDef.summary: Delayed ack timer not armed for LRO

optionDef.label: TcpipHWLRONoDelayAck
optionDef.summary: Delayed ack timer not armed for Hardware LRO (socket option needs to be set in addition).

optionDef.label: TcpipDefLROEnabled
optionDef.summary: LRO enabled for TCP/IP

optionDef.label: Tcpipv6DefLROEnabled
optionDef.summary: LRO enabled for TCP/IPv6. Disabling this doesn't affect IPv4

optionDef.label: TcpipDefLROMaxLength
optionDef.summary: LRO default max length for TCP/IP

optionDef.label: TcpipEnableABC
optionDef.summary: Enable Appropriate Byte Counting for TCP (RFC 3465)

optionDef.label: TcpipEnableFlowtable
optionDef.summary: Enable route caching through the use of flowtable

optionDef.label: TcpipEnableSendScaling
optionDef.summary: Enable Send-Side Scaling (requires RSS)

optionDef.label: TcpipIGMPRejoinInterval
optionDef.summary: Delay in seconds between automatic IGMP rejoins when no querier is present

optionDef.label: TcpipIGMPDefaultVersion
optionDef.summary: Default version of IGMP, in the absence of a querier

optionDef.label: LinkStatePollTimeout
optionDef.summary: Link State poll timer period in milliseconds.

optionDef.label: E1000TxCopySize
optionDef.summary: e1000 tx less than or equal to this will be fully copied with no need for completion.

optionDef.label: E1000TxZeroCopy
optionDef.summary: Use tx zero copy for non-tso packets for e1000.

optionDef.label: E1000IntrCoalesce
optionDef.summary: Whether to enable interrupt coalescing for e1000 vNIC.

optionDef.label: MinEtherLen
optionDef.summary: Minimum size ethernet frame to transmit

optionDef.label: MaxPktRxListQueue
optionDef.summary: Maximum packet we can queue in rxList

optionDef.label: NetBHRxStormThreshold
optionDef.summary: Declare Rx Storm after this number of consecutive rx pkt drops during queuing in NetBH rxList.

optionDef.label: ReversePathFwdCheck
optionDef.summary: Block the multicast/broadcast packets that come back from physical switches in a teamed environment

optionDef.label: ReversePathFwdCheckPromisc
optionDef.summary: Block duplicate packet in a teamed environment when the virtual switch is set to Promiscuous mode.

optionDef.label: MaxTxCompDelay
optionDef.summary: Maximum time in milliseconds transmit completions are delayed

optionDef.label: Vmxnet2PinRxBuf
optionDef.summary: Pin RX buffers for vmxnet2 clients (windows guest only)

optionDef.label: Vmxnet3RSSHashCache
optionDef.summary: Whether to enable RSS hash cache for vmxnet3.

optionDef.label: Vmxnet3RxPollBound

optionDef.label: NetTxWorldlet

optionDef.label: NetTxCompletionWorldlet
optionDef.summary: Whether to enable tx completion in worldlet.

optionDef.label: NetRxCopyWorldlet
optionDef.summary: Whether to enable rx copy in worldlet.

optionDef.label: NetSplitRxMode
optionDef.summary: Whether to enable automatic splitRxMode

optionDef.label: AllowPT
optionDef.summary: Whether to enable UPT/NPA

optionDef.label: PTSwitchingTimeout
optionDef.summary: Timeout (in ms) when asking the VMX/guest to switch in/out of passthru

optionDef.label: VmxnetSwLROSL

optionDef.label: Vmxnet3SwLRO
optionDef.summary: Whether to perform SW LRO on pkts going to a LPD capable vmxnet3

optionDef.label: Vmxnet3HwLRO
optionDef.summary: Whether to enable HW LRO on pkts going to a LPD capable vmxnet3

optionDef.label: Vmxnet2SwLRO
optionDef.summary: Whether to perform SW LRO on pkts going to a LPD capable vmxnet2

optionDef.label: Vmxnet2HwLRO
optionDef.summary: Whether to perform HW LRO on pkts going to a LPD capable vmxnet2

optionDef.label: VmxnetPromDisableLro

optionDef.label: VmxnetLROThreshold

optionDef.label: VmxnetLROBackoffPeriod

optionDef.label: VmxnetLROUseRatioNumer

optionDef.label: VmxnetLROUseRatioDenom

optionDef.label: VmxnetLROMaxLength
optionDef.summary: LRO default max length for TCP/IP

optionDef.label: NetEnableSwCsumForLro
optionDef.summary: Whether enable software checksum for LRO

optionDef.label: TsoDumpPkt
optionDef.summary: detailed dump of every <n> pkts

optionDef.label: IGMPVersion

optionDef.label: IGMPQueries

optionDef.label: NetRmDistMacFilter
optionDef.summary: Activate/Deactivate the MAC filter on distributed NetRM

optionDef.label: NetRmDistSamplingRate
optionDef.summary: Sampling rate on distributed NetRM

optionDef.label: GuestIPHack
optionDef.summary: Enable guest arp inspection IOChain to get IP

optionDef.label: BlockGuestBPDU
optionDef.summary: Block guest sourced BPDU frames

optionDef.label: NetNetqLBDynamicPool
optionDef.summary: Enable Dynamic netq pool feature in Netq LB

optionDef.label: NetNetqRxDynamicLB
optionDef.summary: Enable Netq_LB's Dynamic load balancing feature

optionDef.label: NetNetqRxQueueNoFeat
optionDef.summary: Overwrite the rx queues features advertised by uplinks

optionDef.label: NetNetqRxQueueFeatPairEnable
optionDef.summary: Overwrite the rx queues pair feature advertised by uplinks

optionDef.label: NetSchedLinkSpeedLow
optionDef.summary: Link speed considered low by the scheduler

optionDef.label: NetSchedLinkSpeedHigh
optionDef.summary: Link speed considered high by the scheduler

optionDef.label: NetSchedInFlightMaxPktsLow
optionDef.summary: Number of packets fed to the nic for nics with a low (< 500Mbps) linkspeed

optionDef.label: NetSchedInFlightMaxBytesLow
optionDef.summary: Number of bytes fed to the nic for nics with a low (< 500Mbps) linkspeed

optionDef.label: NetSchedInFlightMaxPktsHigh
optionDef.summary: Number of packets fed to the nic for nics with a high (10Gbps) linkspeed

optionDef.label: NetSchedInFlightMaxBytesHigh
optionDef.summary: Number of bytes fed to the nic for nics with a high (10Gbps) linkspeed

optionDef.label: NetSchedInFlightMaxPktsDefault
optionDef.summary: Number of packets fed to the nic for nics with a normal (1Gbps) linkspeed

optionDef.label: NetSchedInFlightMaxBytesDefault
optionDef.summary: Number of bytes fed to the nic for nics with a normal (1Gbps) linkspeed

optionDef.label: NetSchedInFlightMaxPktsInsane
optionDef.summary: Number of packets fed to the nic for nics that don't support tx completion coalescing

optionDef.label: NetSchedInFlightMaxBytesInsane
optionDef.summary: Number of bytes fed to the nic for nics that don't support tx completion coalescing

optionDef.label: NetSchedCoalesceTxUsecs
optionDef.summary: Maximum number of microseconds the device can delay tx completions

optionDef.label: NetSchedDefaultResPoolSharesPct
optionDef.summary: Percent share given to unclassified traffic

optionDef.label: NetSchedQueuingTimeHisto
optionDef.summary: Enable queuing time histogram for packet scheduler

optionDef.label: NetSchedSpareBasedShares
optionDef.summary: Enable shares scheduling only on spare bandwidth. Don't bill while doing reservation scheduling

optionDef.label: NetShaperQueuePerL3L4Flow
optionDef.summary: Enable queuing per L3/L4 flow hashing

optionDef.label: VmklnxLROEnabled
optionDef.summary: LRO enabled in vmklinux

optionDef.label: VmklnxLROMaxAggr
optionDef.summary: LRO max aggr in vmklinux

optionDef.label: UseHwIPv6Csum
optionDef.summary: When non-zero, use pNIC HW IPv6 csum offload if available

optionDef.label: UseHwCsumForIPv6Csum
optionDef.summary: When non-zero, use pNIC HW_CSUM, if available, as IPv6 csum offload

optionDef.label: UseHwTSO6
optionDef.summary: When non-zero, use pNIC HW IPv6 TSO offload if available

optionDef.label: UseHwTSO
optionDef.summary: When non-zero, use pNIC HW TSO offload if available

optionDef.label: NcpLlcSap
optionDef.summary: beacon/color NCP messages created with this SAP (DSAP/SSAP)

optionDef.label: DVFilterPriorityRdLockEnable
optionDef.summary: Use priority locking in dvfilter to read lock portsets

optionDef.label: FollowHardwareMac
optionDef.summary: If set to 1, the management interface MAC address will update whenever the hardware MAC address changes.

optionDef.label: NetInStressTest
optionDef.summary: If set to 1, suppress certain logs to avoid log spew.

optionDef.label: NetOverlayHostKey
optionDef.summary: hostkey for vmkernel overlay

optionDef.label: DCBEnable
optionDef.summary: Enable DCB for FCoE

optionDef.label: NetTraceEnable
optionDef.summary: Enable virtual network tracing

optionDef.label: LRODefThreshold
optionDef.summary: After this # packets, evaluate whether to continue SW LRO

optionDef.label: LRODefBackoffPeriod
optionDef.summary: After adaptive LRO decided not to do LRO, how many intervals to wait before trying again.

optionDef.label: LRODefUseRatioNumer
optionDef.summary: If SW LRO reduce pkt count to be smaller than ratio, continue to do LRO. Numerator of ratio.

optionDef.label: LRODefUseRatioDenom
optionDef.summary: If SW LRO reduce pkt count to be smaller than ratio, continue to do LRO. Denominator of ratio.

optionDef.label: LRODefMaxLength
optionDef.summary: LRO default max length

optionDef.label: NetDebugRARPTimerInter
optionDef.summary: RARP timer will be triggered at this interval.

optionDef.label: NetPTMgrWakeupInterval
optionDef.summary: How often the PTMgr will wakeup and trigger the UPT mode switch in second.

optionDef.label: NetMaxRarpsPerInterval
optionDef.summary: Max number of RARPs dispatched per timer callback.

optionDef.label: NetPktSlabFreePercentThreshold
optionDef.summary: Percent of free network memory pool, below which an event is reported.

optionDef.label: DVSLargeHeapMaxSize
optionDef.summary: Max size for the dvsLargeHeap

optionDef.label: NetEsxfwPassOutboundGRE
optionDef.summary: Whether outbound GRE traffic is passed by ESXi firewall

optionDef.label: VmkEventPostMsgHeapCheck
optionDef.summary: Check the minimum free space of the heaps before posting VmkEventMsg. 0 to disable, 1 to enable.

optionDef.label: IGMPRouterIP
optionDef.summary: Router IP Address for IGMP (generally not necessary to set this)

optionDef.label: NetSchedDefaultSchedName
optionDef.summary: Default networking packet scheduler

optionDef.label: NetSchedQoSSchedName
optionDef.summary: Default networking packet scheduler for QoS

optionDef.label: DVFilterBindIpAddress
optionDef.summary: DVFilter internal communication endpoint

optionDef.label: TrafficFilterIpAddress
optionDef.summary: Alternate DVFilter internal communication endpoint

optionDef.label: Network I/O control physical NIC opt out option
optionDef.summary: List of physical NICs to opt out of network I/O control

optionDef.label: NmpPReservationCmdRetryTime
optionDef.summary: Time (in secs) to retry on transient errors for Persistent reservation commands for MSCS CAB configs

optionDef.label: Rebalance period
optionDef.summary: Frequency of NUMA node rebalancing in milliseconds

optionDef.label: SwapInterval
optionDef.summary: frequency of NUMA node swap rebalancing, in units of NUMA rebalance period

optionDef.label: SwapConsiderPeriod
optionDef.summary: time between reconsidering a client for swap, in units of NUMA rebalance period

optionDef.label: SwapMigrateOnly
optionDef.summary: frequency of NUMA VM migration only considerations, in units of NUMA rebalance period, 0 to disable pure migrations

optionDef.label: Migration imbalance threshold
optionDef.summary: Minimum percent load imbalance between nodes to trigger migration

optionDef.label: Minimum load improvement for single migration
optionDef.summary: Minimum percent load balance improvement to allow single migration.swap

optionDef.label: Migration thrash threshold
optionDef.summary: Maximum post-migration load imbalance as a percentage of pre-migration imbalance to prevent thrashing

optionDef.label: Enable virtual machine swaps for CPU
optionDef.summary: Enable or disable virtual machine swaps across nodes to balance CPU load

optionDef.label: Enable virtual machine swaps for memory
optionDef.summary: Enable or disable virtual machine swaps across nodes to improve memory locality

optionDef.label: Enable rebalancer
optionDef.summary: Enable or disable NUMA scheduler rebalancer

optionDef.label: Rebalancer total host core count
optionDef.summary: Minimum number of total host cores required to enable NUMA rebalancer

optionDef.label: Rebalancer core count
optionDef.summary: Minimum number of cores per node required to enable NUMA rebalancer

optionDef.label: Monitor migration enable
optionDef.summary: Allow NUMASched monitor migrations. Set to 1 to enable; set to 0 to disable.

optionDef.label: Automatic memory affinity
optionDef.summary: Memory affinity automatically based on CPU affinity. Set to 1 to enable; set to 0 to disable.

optionDef.label: CostopSkewAdjust
optionDef.summary: way to handle costop skew, 0:do nothing, 1:interleave vcpus among clients, 2:allow vcpus on all nodes

optionDef.label: Page migration enable
optionDef.summary: Permit NUMASched to manipulate page migration. Set to 1 to enable; set to 0 to disable.

optionDef.label: PageMigRateMax
optionDef.summary: max page migration rate

optionDef.label: PageMigLinearRun
optionDef.summary: page migration candidates for linear scan, 0 to disable

optionDef.label: PageMigRandomRun
optionDef.summary: page migration candidates for random scan, 0 to disable

optionDef.label: PerClientPageMigRate
optionDef.summary: page migration rate, 0: for the whole VM, 1 : per-client

optionDef.label: UsePPDLocalityInfo
optionDef.summary: Use per-PPD locality information. 0: disable, 1: enable

optionDef.label: LTermFairnessInterval
optionDef.summary: duration of long term fairness interval in terms of NUMA rebalance period, 0 indicates that long term fairness is disabled

optionDef.label: LTermMigImbalThreshold
optionDef.summary: imbalance in long term owed, in percentage, required to trigger migration for long term fairness

optionDef.label: MigPreventLTermThresh
optionDef.summary: long term owed for a VM, in percentage, above which NUMA migration and swaps are disabled for that VM

optionDef.label: CoreCapRatioPct
optionDef.summary: The capacity of a core in percent. When exceeded, locality migration is rejected. Set to 0 to disable this check

optionDef.label: LocalityWeightMem
optionDef.summary: Benefit of improving memory locality by 1 pct.

optionDef.label: LocalityWeightActionAffinity
optionDef.summary: Benefit of improving action affinity by 1.

optionDef.label: LargeInterleave
optionDef.summary: Always use large page interleaving; 0 to disable.

optionDef.label: PreferHT
optionDef.summary: Prefer using HyperThreads on the same NUMA node over full cores on multiple nodes; 0 to disable.

optionDef.label: MaxProximityDomains
optionDef.summary: Maximum physical proximity domains per VM.

optionDef.label: PPDStats
optionDef.summary: 1 to collect per-PPD locality statistics, 2 for large and shared page usage, 0 to disable

optionDef.label: RetryRetirePeriod
optionDef.summary: Time in minutes between attempts to retry retiring MPNs

optionDef.label: MPNThreshold
optionDef.summary: Acceptable threshold for MPNs selected for retirement

optionDef.label: MPNThresholdPct
optionDef.summary: Acceptable threshold for MPNs selected for retirement (in pct of memsize)

optionDef.label: ThresholdInterval
optionDef.summary: Threshold Interval: everytime a multiple of the threshold interval is exceeded, an UI message is generated

optionDef.label: ClientMPNThreshold
optionDef.summary: Acceptable threshold for client MPNs selected for retirement

optionDef.label: PageErrorCorrThreshold
optionDef.summary: Acceptable threshold for correctable errors on a page during a correlation cycle

optionDef.label: PageErrorCorrPeriod
optionDef.summary: Correlation cycle period in seconds

optionDef.label: ApeiRetirementEnabled
optionDef.summary: Enable APEI platform page retirement if supported by the platform

optionDef.label: ApeiLoggingEnabled
optionDef.summary: Send problem events for each APEI platform page retirement request with a valid FRU

optionDef.label: UsePStates
optionDef.summary: In Custom policy, use ACPI P-states to save power when processor is busy

optionDef.label: UseCStates
optionDef.summary: In Custom policy, use ACPI C-states when processor is idle

optionDef.label: MaxCpuLoad
optionDef.summary: In Custom policy, CPU utilization threshold below which CPU frequency can be dynamically adjusted

optionDef.label: MinFreqPct
optionDef.summary: In Custom policy, do not use P-states slower than the given percentage of full CPU speed

optionDef.label: MaxFreqPct
optionDef.summary: In Custom policy, do not use P-states faster than the given percentage of full CPU speed, rounded up to the next available P-state

optionDef.label: TimerHz
optionDef.summary: In Custom policy, dynamic power management timer sampling rate

optionDef.label: CStateMaxLatency
optionDef.summary: In Custom policy, avoid a C-state whose latency is larger than this value (us)

optionDef.label: CStateResidencyCoef
optionDef.summary: In Custom policy, avoid a C-state whose latency * CStateResidencyCoef > predicted residence time

optionDef.label: CStatePredictionCoef
optionDef.summary: In Custom policy, predict non-timer wakeup with error probability p, where CStatePredictionCoef = -ln(1 - p) * (1 << 20)

optionDef.label: PerfBias
optionDef.summary: In Custom policy, Performance Energy Bias Hint (Intel-only)

optionDef.label: PerfBiasEnable
optionDef.summary: Use Performance Energy Bias Hint

optionDef.label: ChargeMemoryPct
optionDef.summary: Percentage of idle power consumed by memory

optionDef.label: RdmFilter.HbaIsShared
optionDef.summary: Allow local disks to be RDM candidates for Virtual Machines

optionDef.label: ScratchConfig.ConfiguredScratchLocation
optionDef.summary: The directory configured to be used for scratch space. Changes will take effect on next reboot.

optionDef.label: ScratchConfig.CurrentScratchLocation
optionDef.summary: The directory currently being used for scratch space.

optionDef.label: Passthrough locking
optionDef.summary: SCSI passthrough locking

optionDef.label: LogCmdErrors
optionDef.summary: Log SCSI Device command errors.

optionDef.label: TransFailLogPct
optionDef.summary: Percent of Transient failures seen on Scsi Device that will be logged.

optionDef.label: LogCmdRCErrorsFreq
optionDef.summary: Number of consecutive RC errors to be seen before logging SCSI Device command.

optionDef.label: LogMPCmdErrors
optionDef.summary: Log SCSI Multi-path plugin command errors.

optionDef.label: LogScsiAborts
optionDef.summary: Log SCSI abort errors and success.

optionDef.label: Maximum reserve time
optionDef.summary: Maximum time (in milliseconds) a system-initiated reservation is normally held

optionDef.label: MaxReserveTotalTime
optionDef.summary: Maximum time (in msecs) a system-initiated reservation normally takes from issue to release (debug only)

optionDef.label: MaxReserveBacktrace
optionDef.summary: Log a backtrace if caller exceeds SCSI_MAX_RESERVE_TIME or SCSI_MAX_RESERVE_TOTALTIME (debug only)

optionDef.label: ReserveBacktrace
optionDef.summary: Log a backtrace for all Reserve/Release pairs (debug only)

optionDef.label: SCSI time-out scan time
optionDef.summary: Time (in milliseconds) to sleep between checking for timed-out asynchronous I/O

optionDef.label: SCSI time-out re-stop time
optionDef.summary: Delay (in milliseconds) after a stop due to time-out before the stop is re-issued

optionDef.label: ScanOnDriverLoad
optionDef.summary: Scan new SCSI buses on device driver load

optionDef.label: TimeoutTMThreadMin
optionDef.summary: Min number of timeout task-mgmt handler threads

optionDef.label: TimeoutTMThreadMax
optionDef.summary: Max number of timeout task-mgmt handler threads

optionDef.label: TimeoutTMThreadExpires
optionDef.summary: Life in seconds of timeout task mgmt handler thread

optionDef.label: TimeoutTMThreadRetry
optionDef.summary: Delay in milliseconds before retrying taskmgmt which failed or for which the I/O did not complete

optionDef.label: TimeoutTMThreadLatency
optionDef.summary: Delay in ms before waking up new task mgmt thread

optionDef.label: ScsiRestartStalledQueueLatency
optionDef.summary: Delay in ms before restarting a stalled queue

optionDef.label: CompareLUNNumber
optionDef.summary: Consider LUN number when determining LUN identity.

optionDef.label: UseAdaptiveRetries
optionDef.summary: Use adaptive retries for transient errors.

optionDef.label: ChangeQErrSetting
optionDef.summary: Change the QErr value of devices to 0x0.

optionDef.label: ScanSync
optionDef.summary: Force LU scanning operations to be synchronous if set.

optionDef.label: FailVMIOonAPD
optionDef.summary: Fast fail virtual machine I/Os on APD Timeout.

optionDef.label: WorldletAffinity
optionDef.summary: TX Affinity: 0 - Disabled, 1 - Issuing world, 2 - Exact RX worldlet, 3 - Loose RX worldlet

optionDef.label: MaxConnPerIP
optionDef.summary: Max number of TCP/IP connection per IP

optionDef.label: SendLowat
optionDef.summary: Send buffer lowat (%)

optionDef.label: SvMotionAvgDisksPerVM
optionDef.summary: Initial Storage vMotion Heap Size is proportional to this setting

optionDef.label: Syslog.global.defaultRotate
optionDef.summary: Default number of rotated logs to keep. Reset to default on zero.

optionDef.label: Syslog.global.defaultSize
optionDef.summary: Default size of logs before rotation, in KiB. Reset to default on zero.

optionDef.label: Syslog.global.logDir
optionDef.summary: Datastore path of directory to output logs to. Reset to default on null. Example: [datastoreName]/logdir

optionDef.label: Syslog.global.logDirUnique
optionDef.summary: Place logs in a unique subdirectory of logdir, based on hostname.

optionDef.label: Syslog.global.logHost
optionDef.summary: The remote host to output logs to. Reset to default on null. Multiple hosts are supported and must be separated with comma (,). Example: udp://hostName1:514, hostName2, ssl://hostName3:1514

optionDef.label: Read directory retries
optionDef.summary: Maximum number of retries when reading entries from directories

optionDef.label: PTEDisableNX
optionDef.summary: Disables the use of NX bit in user pagetable entries

optionDef.label: ActiveDirectoryPreferredDomainControllers
optionDef.summary: Preferred Domain Controllers for Active Directory

optionDef.label: ActiveDirectoryVerifyCAMCertificate
optionDef.summary: Enable or disable verification of SSL certificate for vSphere Authentication Proxy server

optionDef.label: ESXiShellTimeOut
optionDef.summary: Time before automatically disabling local and remote shell access (in seconds, 0 disables). Takes effect after the services are restarted.

optionDef.label: ESXiShellInteractiveTimeOut
optionDef.summary: Idle time before an interactive shell is automatically logged out (in seconds, 0 disables). Takes effect only for newly logged in sessions.

optionDef.label: SuppressShellWarning
optionDef.summary: Do not show warning for enabled local and remote shell access

optionDef.label: CIMEnabled
optionDef.summary: Enable or disable the CIM service

optionDef.label: CIMLogLevel
optionDef.summary: Set the log level of the CIM Service

optionDef.label: CIMWatchdogInterval
optionDef.summary: Set the watchdog polling interval for the CIM Service

optionDef.label: EsximageNetTimeout
optionDef.summary: Set the timeout in seconds for downloading VIBs (0=no timeout)

optionDef.label: EsximageNetRetries
optionDef.summary: Set the number of times to retry in case of failure while downloading VIBs

optionDef.label: EsximageNetRateLimit
optionDef.summary: Set the maximum rate, in bytes/sec, for downloading VIBs (0=no limit)

optionDef.label: ProductLockerLocation
optionDef.summary: Path to VMware Tools and vSphere Client repository

optionDef.label: SuppressCoredumpWarning
optionDef.summary: Do not show warning for disabled or unconfigured coredump target

optionDef.label: HostdStatsstoreRamdiskSize
optionDef.summary: Explicitly specify size for the ramdisk hostd uses to store stats (in megabytes, 0 default). Takes effect after hostd service is restarted.

optionDef.label: VMAuthdDisabledProtocols
optionDef.summary: VMAuthd disabled protocols. By default sslv3 is disabled. If you want to enable sslv3, set the setting to empty.

optionDef.label: ESXiVPsDisabledProtocols
optionDef.summary: ESXi VPs disabled protocols. Choices are sslv3, tlsv1, tlsv1.1, tlsv1.2. By default sslv3 is disabled. If no protocol is specified, all protocols are enabled.

optionDef.label: CIMvmw_hhrcwrapperProviderEnabled
optionDef.summary: Enable or disable the CIM vmw_hhrcwrapper provider

optionDef.label: CIMvmw_swmgtProviderEnabled
optionDef.summary: Enable or disable the CIM vmw_swmgt provider

optionDef.label: CIMvmw_viProviderEnabled
optionDef.summary: Enable or disable the CIM vmw_vi provider

optionDef.label: CIMvmw_hdrProviderEnabled
optionDef.summary: Enable or disable the CIM vmw_hdr provider

optionDef.label: CIMvmw_iodmProviderProviderEnabled
optionDef.summary: Enable or disable the CIM vmw_iodmProvider provider

optionDef.label: CIMvmw_kmoduleProviderEnabled
optionDef.summary: Enable or disable the CIM vmw_kmodule provider

optionDef.label: CIMvmw_pciProviderEnabled
optionDef.summary: Enable or disable the CIM vmw_pci provider

optionDef.label: CIMvmw_sfcbrInteropProviderEnabled
optionDef.summary: Enable or disable the CIM vmw_sfcbrInterop provider

optionDef.label: CIMvmw_hhrcwrapperProviderPollingInterval
optionDef.summary: Set the hhrc provider polling interval

optionDef.label: VBLOBMaxHeapSizeMB
optionDef.summary: Maximum size (in MB) to which the VBLOB heap is allowed to grow

optionDef.label: MaxCacheFileSizeMB
optionDef.summary: Maximum file size (in MB) of virtual Flash Read Cache supported

optionDef.label: MaxHeapSizeMB
optionDef.summary: Maximum size (in MB) to which the virtual flash heap is allowed to grow

optionDef.label: CacheStatsEnable
optionDef.summary: Virtual Flash Read Cache statistics enable?

optionDef.label: CacheStatsFromVFC
optionDef.summary: Use cache statistics from virtual Flash Read Cache module?

optionDef.label: MaxDiskFileSizeGB
optionDef.summary: Maximum supported disk size (in GB) with virtual Flash Read Cache configuration

optionDef.label: MaxResourceGBForVmCache
optionDef.summary: Maximum supported virtual flash resource (in GB) to be allocated for VM caches

optionDef.label: ResourceUsageThreshold
optionDef.summary: Threshold (in percentage) of virtual flash resource usage

optionDef.label: VMFS.UnresolvedVolumeLiveCheck
optionDef.summary: Enable/disable liveliness check during unresolved volume query.

optionDef.label: OpenWithoutJournal
optionDef.summary: Open file system when out of space for journal allocation, allowing reads and no meta-data updates

optionDef.label: MaxHeapSizeMB
optionDef.summary: Maximum size (in MB) to which the VMFS heap is allowed to grow

optionDef.label: MaxextendedTxnsUsingfs3Heap
optionDef.summary: Maximum number of extended transactions for which log space can be allocated from VMFS3 heap when the extendedTxnRegion is full

optionDef.label: StAtExclLockEnd
optionDef.summary: Generate Back Trace in FS3_EndIOExclusive

optionDef.label: MaxAddressableSpaceTB
optionDef.summary: Maximum size of all open files that VMFS cache will support before eviction mechanisms kick in

optionDef.label: MinAddressableSpaceTB
optionDef.summary: Minimum size of all open files that VMFS cache will support (guaranteed)

optionDef.label: HardwareAcceleratedLocking
optionDef.summary: Enable hardware accelerated VMFS locking (requires compliant hardware)

optionDef.label: FailVolumeOpenIfAPD
optionDef.summary: Fail VMFS volume open operation if the underlying device is deemed to be under an all-paths-down condition

optionDef.label: EnableBlockDelete
optionDef.summary: Enable VMFS block delete when UNMAP is issued from guest OS

optionDef.label: Use ATS For HB On VMFS5
optionDef.summary: Use ATS for Heartbeat on ATS supported VMFS5 volumes

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.allowNonNX
optionDef.summary: Allow booting with NX feature disabled or non present.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.autoCreateDumpFile
optionDef.summary: If enabled and if no suitable dump partition or dump file exists, create a dump file.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.autoPartition
optionDef.summary: Enable/Disable auto-partitioning of empty local disks.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.autoPartitionCreateUSBCoreDumpPartition
optionDef.summary: Enable/Disable auto-partitioning of core dump partition for USB boot devices. Requires that autoPartition is set to TRUE as well.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.autoPartitionDiskDumpPartitionSize
optionDef.summary: Disk dump partition size in MB that gets configured during the auto-partition process.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.bootDeviceRescanTimeout
optionDef.summary: Boot device rescan timeout (in minutes).

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.busSpeedMayVary
optionDef.summary: Allow different APIC timer speeds on different CPUs.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.cacheFlushImmOnAllHalt
optionDef.summary: Flush caches immediately if all cores sharing LLC halt (AMD only)

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.checkCPUIDLimit
optionDef.summary: Refuse to run on CPUID limited cpus.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.checkPages
optionDef.summary: Check for pages being not corrupted. Works only for free and free-lpage-pool pages.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.com1_baud
optionDef.summary: Baud rate for COM1.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.com2_baud
optionDef.summary: Baud rate for COM2.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.coresPerPkg
optionDef.summary: Number of cores per package that vmkernel should use

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.debugBreak
optionDef.summary: Break into debugger during vmkernel initialization.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.debugLogToSerial
optionDef.summary: 0=Serial debug logging off, 1=Serial debug logging on, 2=Defer to config option DebugLogToSerial.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.disableACSCheck
optionDef.summary: Bypass ACS capability checks on all PCIE devices

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.disableCFOH
optionDef.summary: Disable Cache Flush on Halt

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.disableTurbo
optionDef.summary: Disable Turbo Mode

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.diskDumpSlotSize
optionDef.summary: Disk dump slot size in MB. 0 = automatically sized, otherwise requsted size >= 100 MB.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.dmaEngineExposeIdentityMapping
optionDef.summary: Whether to expose whether DMA engines do identity mapping.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.dmaMapperPolicy
optionDef.summary: DMA mapping policy to use.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.enableACSCheckForRP
optionDef.summary: Enable ACS capability checks for Root Port

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.execInstalledOnly
optionDef.summary: Execute only those files that have been installed via a vib package and have not been modified.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.fsCheck
optionDef.summary: Run filesystem checks on system partitions.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.gdbPort
optionDef.summary: gdb port; com1 or com2

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.generalCriticalMemory
optionDef.summary: Pages to reserve as general critical memory

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.heapCheckTimerInterval
optionDef.summary: Interval in seconds between heap timer checks

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.heapFreeOwnerCheck
optionDef.summary: Check heap ownership on free operations

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.heapFreePoisonByte
optionDef.summary: Byte pattern used to poison freed memory

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.heapMetaPoisonByte
optionDef.summary: Byte pattern used to poison red zones for allocations

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.heapMetadataProtect
optionDef.summary: Use poisoned red zones to protect against under/overruns

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.heapPoisonFreeMem
optionDef.summary: Poison free memory to catch use after free bugs

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.heapPoisonTimerChecks
optionDef.summary: Check heap poisoned areas for corruption on regular intervals

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.hyperthreading
optionDef.summary: Enable hyperthreading if available.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.ioAbilityChecks
optionDef.summary: Enforce checking of whether regions can be DMA mapped.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.ipmiEnabled
optionDef.summary: Enable IPMI

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.leaveWakeGPEsDisabled
optionDef.summary: Disallow a wake GPE from also being a runtime GPE

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.logPort
optionDef.summary: Serial port to enable for logging; com1 or com2

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.maxLogEntries
optionDef.summary: Size of the kernel log buffer in 256-byte lines. 0=Use default. Min is 1024. Max is 32768.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.maxPCPUS
optionDef.summary: Number of PCPUs vmkernel should use.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.maxPCPUsNUMAInterleaving
optionDef.summary: Enable NUMA-node interleaving of enabled PCPUs.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.maxVMs
optionDef.summary: Max number of VMs VMKernel should support. 0 == determine at runtime

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.memCheckEveryWord
optionDef.summary: Check every single word when checking mem.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.memLowReservedMB
optionDef.summary: Amount of low memory (< 4 GB) which gets reserved. 0 == determine at runtime

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.memmapMaxEarlyPoisonMemMB
optionDef.summary: Memory that should be poisoned during early initialization.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.memmapMaxPhysicalMemMB
optionDef.summary: Maximum physical memory (in MB) addressable by kernel.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.memmapMaxRAMMB
optionDef.summary: Maximum conventional memory (RAM) supported on the system. Additional RAM above this limit will not be used by the system.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.netCoalesceTimerHdlrPcpu
optionDef.summary: Pcpu that coalesce timeout handler runs on.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.netGPHeapMaxMBPerGB
optionDef.summary: Maximum MB of the general purpose networking heap to be allocated per GB of physical memory.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.netMaxPktsToProcess
optionDef.summary: Maximum number of packets to process in each invocation packet processing routine

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.netNetqueueEnabled
optionDef.summary: Enable/Disable NetQueue support.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.netPagePoolLimitCap
optionDef.summary: Maximum number of pages period for the packet page pool.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.netPagePoolLimitPerGB
optionDef.summary: Maximum number of pages for the packet page pool per gigabyte.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.netPagePoolResvCap
optionDef.summary: Maximum number of pages to reserve for the packet page pool.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.netPagePoolResvPerGB
optionDef.summary: Number of pages to reserve for the packet page pool per gigabyte.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.netPktHeapMaxMBPerGB
optionDef.summary: Maximum MB of low-memory packet heap to be allocated per GB of physical memory. Maximum value for this setting is 512.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.netPktHeapMinMBPerGB
optionDef.summary: Minimum MB of low-memory packet heap to be allocated per GB of physical memory. Maximum value for this setting is 200.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.netPktPoolMaxMBPerGB
optionDef.summary: Maximum MB of networking packet buffer pool to be allocated per GB of physical memory. Maximum value for this setting is 200. Net packet pool maximum per system will be at least 656MB.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.netPktPoolMinMBPerGB
optionDef.summary: Minimum MB of networking packet buffer pool to be allocated per GB of physical memory (multiple of 24)

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.nmiAction
optionDef.summary: 0=Undefined behavior on hardware NMI, 1=Enter debugger on hardware NMI 2=Panic on hardware NMI, 3=Pass NMI to Service Console.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.numPreAllocEmergencyWorldStacks
optionDef.summary: Number of pre-allocated world stacks for emergency pool.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.numaLatencyLoops
optionDef.summary: Number of NUMA latency probing loops. 0 to disable latency measurement

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.numaLatencyPages
optionDef.summary: Number of pages to be probed per-node for NUMA latency measurements

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.numaLatencyRemoteThresholdPct
optionDef.summary: Maximum measured memory access latency difference (in percent units) between 2 pairs of NUMA nodes for the pairs to be considered equidistant

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.overrideDuplicateImageDetection
optionDef.summary: Override duplicate ESXi image detection

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.poisonMarkerHigh
optionDef.summary: High 32 bits of value used to poison memmap pages

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.poisonMarkerLow
optionDef.summary: Low 32 bits of value used to poison memmap pages

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.poisonPagePool
optionDef.summary: Poison memmap pages

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.powerManagement
optionDef.summary: Enable CPU power management at boot

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.preferVmklinux
optionDef.summary: Boost priority of vmklinux drivers to trump native drivers.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.preventFreePageMapping
optionDef.summary: Prevent mapping of free pages

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.rtcEnableLegacy
optionDef.summary: Enable legacy CMOS device as real time clock (preferred)

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.rtcEnableTAD
optionDef.summary: Enable ACPI 5.0 Time and Alarm Device as real time clock

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.scrubIgnoredPages
optionDef.summary: Check pages that got ignored due to vmbIgnoreStartMPN and vmbIgnoreNumMPNs boot options.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.scrubMemoryAfterModuleLoad
optionDef.summary: Check all memory after each module load. This causes booting to be very slow.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.serialUntrusted
optionDef.summary: Disable serial port if UART misbehaves.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.skipPartitioningSsds
optionDef.summary: If enabled, skip auto-partitioning of empty local SSDs.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.storageHeapMaxSize
optionDef.summary: Maximum size in bytes of the main storage heap

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.storageHeapMinSize
optionDef.summary: Minimum size in bytes of the main storage heap

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.storageMaxDevices
optionDef.summary: Maximum number of supported SCSI devices

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.storageMaxPaths
optionDef.summary: Maximum number of supported SCSI paths

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.storageMaxVMsPerDevice
optionDef.summary: Maximum number of VMs expected to use a given device

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.terminateVMOnPDL
optionDef.summary: Terminate virtual machine on permanent loss of storage

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.timerEnableACPI
optionDef.summary: Enable ACPI PM timer as system reference timer.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.timerEnableHPET
optionDef.summary: Enable HPET as system reference timer.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.timerEnableTSC
optionDef.summary: Enable TSC as system reference timer.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.timerForceTSC
optionDef.summary: Always use TSC as system reference timer.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.tscSpeedMayVary
optionDef.summary: Allow different TSC speeds on different CPUs.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.tty1Port
optionDef.summary: TTY1 port; com1, com2 ... to enable

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.tty2Port
optionDef.summary: TTY2 port; com1, com2 ... to enable

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.updateBusIRQ
optionDef.summary: Allow adding/removing busIRQ information

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.useNUMAInfo
optionDef.summary: Enable/disable NUMA-ness

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.useReliableMem
optionDef.summary: System is aware of reliable memory.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.useSLIT
optionDef.summary: Use NUMA latency information from the SLIT table if available

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.vmkATKeyboard
optionDef.summary: Enable VMkernel AT keyboard driver.

optionDef.label: VMkernel.Boot.vmkacEnable
optionDef.summary: 0=Disabled, 1=Enforcing, 2=Do not enforce, just warn

optionDef.label: ClomRepairDelay
optionDef.summary: Minutes to wait for absent components to come back before starting repair (REQUIRES clomd RESTART!)

optionDef.label: ClomMaxComponentSizeGB
optionDef.summary: Max component size in GB. Should be no larger than 80% of the typical HDD size in the VSAN cluster. (REQUIRES clomd RESTART!)

optionDef.label: DomLongOpTraces
optionDef.summary: Trace ops that take more than the specified option value in second(s)

optionDef.label: DomBriefIoTraces
optionDef.summary: Enables a brief set of per-IO DOM traces for debugging

optionDef.label: DomFullIoTraces
optionDef.summary: Enables the full set of per-IO DOM traces for debugging

optionDef.label: TraceEnableDom
optionDef.summary: Enables tracing for VSAN DOM component

optionDef.label: TraceEnableDomIo
optionDef.summary: Enables tracing for VSAN DOMIO component

optionDef.label: TraceEnableLsom
optionDef.summary: Enables tracing for VSAN LSOM component

optionDef.label: TraceEnableCmmds
optionDef.summary: Enables tracing for VSAN CMMDS and CMMDSResolver components

optionDef.label: TraceEnableRdt
optionDef.summary: Enables tracing for VSAN RDT component

optionDef.label: TraceEnablePlog
optionDef.summary: Enables tracing for VSAN PLOG component

optionDef.label: TraceEnableSsdLog
optionDef.summary: Enables tracing for VSAN SSDLOG component

optionDef.label: DefaultHostDecommissionMode
optionDef.summary: Default host decommission mode for a given node

optionDef.label: VMFSOptimizations
optionDef.summary: Enable VMFS-specific IO optimizations

optionDef.label: Log level
optionDef.summary: vCenter agent logging level

choiceInfo.label: strong
choiceInfo.summary: Cache data consistency is guaranteed after a crash

choiceInfo.label: write_thru
choiceInfo.summary: Writes to the cache cause writes to the underlying storage
